content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you! How are you?
I am good! I am currently watching a horror movie with my husband, and it is giving me the creeps!
Oh! I do not like horror movies, they make me too jumpy. I like to watch movies that are funny or romantic.
I love funny movies too! But I love a good horror movie every once in awhile.
I like to have a good time when I watch movies, so I usually avoid horror movies.
I can understand that! I do not like to be scared when I am trying to relax.
Exactly! What is your favorite movie?
I have so many favorite movies, but I think one of my favorites is The Princess Bride.
I have never seen that movie! What is it about?
It is about a young boy who is sick, and his grandfather reads him a story about a beautiful princess and a farm boy.
That sounds like a great movie! I will have to check it out.
I highly recommend it! It is a classic.
Thank you for the recommendation! I love getting new movie recommendations.
You are welcome! I love talking about movies.
Me too! It is one of my favorite things to do
